alert.note: Alert for Tyler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 04 at 11:08PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Tyler County through 1145 PM CDT... At 1108 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Alabama-Coushatta Reservation, or 10 miles west of Warren, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Woodville, Colmesneil and Ivanhoe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for southeastern Texas.
